comments.text:
It reports all the files which are now in omni.jar:
{
+bin/chrome/classic/skin/classic/communicator/aboutSessionRestore.css
+bin/chrome/classic/skin/classic/communicator/aboutSyncTabs.css
+bin/chrome/classic/skin/classic/communicator/bookmarks/allBookmarks.png
...
}

Guessing:
Should omni.jar be extracted (then removed?) at the start of 'package-compare'?
Would it break something else?

comments.text: There is no way to fix this reasonably unless omni.jar will be (correctly) created at build time and not only at packaging time. If that's not in the plans, I see this as a WONTFIX. Sorry.
comments.raw_text: There is no way to fix this reasonably unless omni.jar will be (correctly) created at build time and not only at packaging time. If that's not in the plans, I see this as a WONTFIX. Sorry.
comments.creator: kairo@kairo.at
